shortInfo: Full-stack developer with expertise in Java and React.
summary: Experienced full-stack developer at Foxit Software with 4 years in Java, Spring Boot, and React. Skilled in microservices and REST API design.

projects.whatHaveDone: Developed backend services and integrated with frontend for real-time team estimations.
projects.roleAndResponsibility: Backend Developer - Designed REST APIs, authentication system, and database schema.

projects.whatHaveDone: Designed and implemented the backend services that power a real-time, poker-style estimation tool. Implemented room/session management, unique link generation for participants, vote collection, result aggregation, and reconnection handling.
projects.roleAndResponsibility: Backend Developer - Responsible for designing REST/WebSocket APIs, persistent storage schema, real-time event handling (WebSocket), concurrency handling, and writing unit & integration tests. Implemented server-side logic to prevent duplicate votes and to compute consensus statistics.

projects.whatHaveDone: Built a centralized authentication service and API Gateway that authenticates users once and enforces role-based access across multiple microservices. Implemented JWT issuance/validation, token refresh, and privilege-based routing at the gateway to keep downstream services stateless.
projects.roleAndResponsibility: Backend Developer - Designed authentication flow (login-service), implemented Spring Security + OAuth2/JWT, created gateway filters for token validation and RBAC enforcement, and integrated user-role management with the user-service. Documented security design and supported rollout/migrations.

projects.whatHaveDone: Implemented real-time document editing and sharing features using WebSocket and REST APIs.
